title: Should We Be Scared of Omicron?
sub_head: Students debate the response to the new Covid variant.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss how worried they are about the Omicron variant. Next week we’ll ask, “Student debt payments have been deferred until May of this year. Should Biden continue deferring student debt?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Jan. 18. The best responses will be published that night.
